code: import React from'react';import{Button,useWalletModal}from'@pancakeswap/uikit';import useAuth from'hooks/useAuth';import{useTranslation}from'contexts/Localization';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ConnectWalletButton=props=>{const{t}=useTranslation();const{login,logout}=useAuth();const{onPresentConnectModal}=useWalletModal(login,logout);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:onPresentConnectModal,...props,children:t('Connect Wallet')});};export default ConnectWalletButton;
